data.prayer: Father, help your children in Loiret, Centre-Val de Loire, France find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Loiret, Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Loiret, Centre-Val de Loire, France with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: the county of Loiret has (about) 8,258 people who know Jesus, 411,003 people who know about him culturally, and 252,839 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, for the leaders in the county of Loiret, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Fleury-les-Aubrais
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Fleury-les-Aubrais, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Loiret, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Loiret.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 672,100 souls in Loiret and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
